title: unknown gothic font on eye chart
author: derl

comments.content:
wow thanks! seem similar but not quite exactly it, though. :/  
this appears to be a vintage chart, are there fonts like this that were commonly in use in the mid-20th century?

it feels very VENUS, although it's not. :(

this might be in the same ballpark for you, depending on your needs.

[Venus Bold Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20120718033336/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=424975&ProductID=155041&ProductNo=EFO113123-4)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120718033336im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eyechart_6179.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120718033336im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eye-chart_5613.jpg)
